start.en:
Hi! ğŸ‘‹ This bot gives you access to the best AI models for working with text and documents, and for generating images, video and music.

New models available: OpenAI o3, o4 mini, GPTâ€‘4o, DeepSeek, Claude 4.5, /Midjourney, /StableDiffusion, Flux, Kling, /Suno, Perplexity and more.

Free: GPT 5 mini and Gemini 2.5 Flash.

The bot can:
â€¢ Write and translate text ğŸ“
â€¢ Generate images and videos ğŸŒ…ğŸ¬
â€¢ Work with documents ğŸ—‚
â€¢ Write and edit code âŒ¨
â€¢ Solve math problems ğŸ§®
â€¢ Create music and songs ğŸ¸
â€¢ Edit photos and do OCR ğŸ–Œ
â€¢ Produce theses, coursework, essays, reports, books and presentations ğŸ“
â€¢ Textâ€‘toâ€‘speech and speech recognition/transcription ğŸ™

ğŸ“ TEXT: just ask a question or send a voice message (choose a model in /model).
â€¢ /i + query â€” web search

ğŸŒ… IMAGES: use /imagine + description (/Midjourney, /StableDiffusion, Flux and DALLÂ·E 3 are available in /premium).

ğŸ¬ VIDEO: /video â€” generate clips (available in /Kling, Veo3).

ğŸ¸ MUSIC: /music â€” choose a genre and add lyrics (available in /Suno).

â¡ï¸ FORWARDED MESSAGES: forward a message to the bot for analysis, rewriting, article creation, etc.
